meanings.definition: A person in charge of a group of workers.
meanings.sent1: The foremen oversaw the construction crew.
meanings.sent2: The foremen led the team of builders on the project.
meanings.sent3: The foremen joked with the workers to keep morale high.
meanings.sent4: The foremen were the captains of the workship, guiding their crew through rough seas of tasks.
meanings.sent5: The image of the foremen with their hard hats and clipboards became synonymous with authority on the site.

meanings.sent1: The foremen gathered for a meeting to discuss the project.
meanings.sent2: The foremen were respected by the workers for their leadership.
meanings.sent3: The foremen's hats were all lined up neatly in the office.
meanings.sent4: The foremen stood out in the crowd with their distinct uniforms.
meanings.sent5: The foremen's voices echoed in the factory as they coordinated tasks.
